title: Update device
name: Update
description: The update operation checks for update to the card reader and initiates an update if needed. The update can either be a software update or a configuration update.

parameters.name: device
parameters.notes: This parameter specifies to the system which device you want to use for the operations. If none is supplied the system will attempt to use a default device, if any.

elements.name: None
elements.description: Information about this process should be available at the device's screen.

elements.name: Boolean
elements.description: true if the operation was successfully sent to device
